However, this is not true as previous pandemics did not follow weather patterns. Additionally, as we enter summer in the Northern Hemisphere, there will be winter in the Southern Hemisphere, making the virus a global issue.

The vaccine is an important tool in this fight, and it is encouraging to see so many people receiving it. Please refrain from stating that the vaccine has no serious side effects. I received my vaccinations and am currently able to continue working.

This is a testament to the power of science and its ability to inspire. However, the lack of effective communication about this process has had devastating consequences.
